#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

long mini(long x,long y)
{
    if(x>y)
    return x;
    else return y;
}

int main()
{

    int t,k,x,y,z;//count =0;
    long long count =0;
    scanf("%d",&t);

    while(t)
    {
        scanf("%d %d %d %d",&k,&x,&y,&z);
        count =0;
        for(int i=0;i<=min(x,k);i++)
        {
            //count++;
//            if(i+y>k){
//            count = count + k-i+1;
//
//            }
//            else
//            count = count + y+1;
            for(int j=0;j<=min(y,k-i)&&((i+j)<=k);j++)
            {

                if(i+j+z>k){
                count = count+ k-i-j+1;
                //cout<<i<<j<<z<<k<<count<<"--1";
                }
                else
                {count = count + z +1;
                     //cout<<i<<j<<z<<k<<count<<"--2";
            }}


        }

        printf("%lld\n",count);


        t--;
    }





    return 0;
}
